paragraphs.label: we are artists united to tell compelling stories

paragraphs.note: At POSTRED, we believe that sound is a storytelling tool for artists. We are a highly skilled and enthusiastic audio post-production team with one goal – to tell stories.
We are the cheat code to your team's success because we hit every aspect of the triangle: quality, speed, and cost-effectiveness.
POSTRED, established in 2015, is now nine years old and has expanded to various industries. We work with international brands like HBO, Netflix, Sony, and others to create Foley for their projects.
As a go-to creative audio service partner for sound artists and sound companies, we are known for our scalable infrastructure, talented team, and exceptional client service.
By leveraging technology, expertise, and a deep understanding of client needs, we aspire to be the trusted choice for creative audio services, enabling our clients' visions to come to life.

paragraphs.label: we challenge the conventional approach to audio

paragraphs.note: We focus on team augmentation, seamlessly integrating with your project to streamline the audio production process through established workflow.
Our team believes every project is an untold story ready to be handled with special care to shape itself into something extraordinary through well-thought experiments.

header.title: facilities
header.description:
With hard work and dedication, we took an old soviet film studio and gave it a new life, equipping it with state-of-the-art technologies.

We have built on its legacy and blended old with new.

left_column.caption: we communicate actively with the major studios to be in line with their security requirements.
left_column.description: In the digital era, content security is one of the most critical parts of the industry, and we take it very seriously for our clients and our own peace of mind.

paragraphs.note:
POSTRED acquires TPN Certification from TRUSTED PARTNER NETWORK powered by the Motion Picture Association (MPA).

POSTRED meets Warner Bros. Discovery's security requirements and is authorized to receive content from Warner Bros. Discovery and its affiliates.

POSTRED meets Warner Bros Discovery's security requirements and is authorized to receive content from WarnerMedia and its affiliates.

POSTRED also meets Disney's minimum Tier 2 security requirements and is authorized to receive content from Walt Disney Studios and Television Group(s) based on the applied tier.

This is a testament to our industry-standard IT security measures.

Even though it initially seemed impossible, we now collaborate with numerous accomplished sound artists in the industry, helping them achieve their audio vision and fostering mutually beneficial partnerships.

Suppose you have a sharp eye for recognizing the spark in people who will do anything to do their favorite job every day. In that case, you can transform passionate young people into industry professionals who will do what they love every day and, as a result, become exceptional sound artists.
For us, audio is one of the key parts of visual media, and we want to help storytellers tell compelling stories by creating meaningful and story-driven soundscapes.

We strive to create a landscape that captivates and resonates with listeners, leaving an unforgettable mark on their hearts and minds. Through innovation, creativity, and a passion for excellence, we aspire to be the driving force behind memorable audio journeys that leave a lasting impression.

header.title: impact
header.description: Being in the industry, we significantly focus on community building by hosting various community events, live performances, and educational workshops.

header.title: academy
header.description: Today, at our POSTRED Academy, we can share our passion and knowledge with the new generation of sound enthusiasts nationwide.

paragraphs.note: At POSTRED, we offer a dedicated session management team to help audio professionals offload some of the most tedious tasks.
Our session management service allows sound artists to focus on the creative aspects of their work while leaving the re-conform process to us.

gallery_items.title: focus on creativity, leave the rest to us

columns.title: communication is the key
columns.text_primary: Communication between our session management team and the sound artist we work with is crucial for achieving the vision.
columns.text_secondary:
After analyzing your project and creating a comprehensive plan, we start the re-conform process once running the details with you, ensuring a unified audio vision and a pleasant re-conform experience.

Being adaptable and having a vast arsenal of plugins, we can take your Pro Tools session and seamlessly continue your production on our end.

columns.title: working on extended scenes
columns.text_primary: For extended scenes, as part of our re-conform service, we provide a complete audio spectrum that includes recording Foley on our state-of-the-art stages, crafting sound effects, and mixing, all tailored to your project's needs.
columns.text_secondary: We always work to extend your original audio work smoothly, maintaining quality and consistency.

columns.title: treating with care
columns.text_primary: We genuinely care about easing the re-conform process and contributing to the success of each project.
columns.text_secondary: Our re-conform team reviews each audio track in your project, examining every background, Foley, and sound effect to create a comprehensive plan and execute it precisely.

paragraphs.note: By offering customized support and collaborating closely with sound artists, our goal is to provide a smooth and hassle-free re-conform experience that respects the creative vision and timelines of the project.
We recognize that each project presents its own set of unique demands and challenges.
With expertise in handling complex timelines and multiple project versions, we efficiently address any changes required in the re-conform process.

Having vast experience in Foley and generally delivering a full cycle of post-production gives us the ability to be a reliable addition to your team, preparing international versions by doing M&E filling and mixing. We will take your stress and the burden of doing this tedious task, knowing there is pressure to deliver quickly.
Our famous Foley stages and Dolby Atmos stage allow you to hand us the project to augment it for distribution.

gallery_items.title: focus on creativity, leave the rest to us

paragraphs.label: recording missing foley
paragraphs.note: With our famous Foley and having several teams, we can quickly record whatever Foley is missing in the M&E track.

paragraphs.label: preparing deliveries according to distributor specifications
paragraphs.note: We can also prepare additional deliveries you have according to the requirements.

paragraphs.label: matching acoustics
paragraphs.note: Using our big Foley stages or plugins you used during mixing, we match acoustics for additional recordings to mix them into the soundtrack smoothly.

paragraphs.label: internal qc
paragraphs.note: Every delivery project goes through our detailed internal QC before being handed back to the client.

paragraphs.label: extracting sound from production track
paragraphs.note: We can review your session and extract production effects that could be used in international versions.

paragraphs.label: quick turnaround
paragraphs.note: Having several teams for each department gives us the flexibility to adjust to time deadlines, making us a reliable vendor for clients.

paragraphs.label: problem solving
paragraphs.note: With our expertise in M&E mixing and finishing, we vigilantly monitor the process to identify and resolve any issues, ensuring a seamless final product for you.

paragraphs.label: adjusting to your specifications
paragraphs.note: With our cutting edge facilities we have all the equipment and knowledge to adjust to any deliverables specs provided by your distributor.

paragraphs.label: internal QC
paragraphs.note: We have a well trained and dedicated team to do the QC check for all the deliverables we do.

paragraphs.label: quick turnaround
paragraphs.note: We know how stressful it gets when it comes to finishing deliveries. And being around the time zones gives us the possibility to speed up the process twice.

chapter.title: crafting your vision into exceptional sounds
chapter.description: We understand game audio teams' challenges when balancing limited resources, time, and quality. We create comprehensive briefs and take all the management and technical burden from you to amplify your capacity to craft your vision into exceptional sounds.

paragraphs.note: Being gamers ourselves, when making sound effects, we consider every important detail, from concept art to sound's game feel. Having many sound design suites and three Foley stages allows us to cater to almost all ranges of projects.

chapter.title: every sound is the game’s signature
chapter.description:
We think like game developers and storytellers to sculpt every sound into the game's core identity. Each sound effect should help tell the story.

We believe that designing sounds from scratch is a way to create impactful sound effects. So, we leverage our resources to do daring experiments. We bring the audio director's vision to life through Foley, music, and custom tools lab.

paragraphs.label: equipment arsenal
paragraphs.note: We collect and use a broad collection of top-notch microphones to record detailed sound effects, from our Foley stages to field recording.

paragraphs.label: field recording
paragraphs.note: Coming from the film world, recording unique sounds is our daily pleasure. Ten years in business allows us to record everything from essential ambiance from old soviet cars to heavy military equipment.

paragraphs.label: hand-tailored sounds
paragraphs.note: Our studio's strong Foley culture empowers us to create custom props for every game we work on.

paragraphs.label: custom hardware and software tools
paragraphs.note: We have custom-built software, hardware tools, and synthesizers to experiment with.

paragraphs.label: focus on realism
paragraphs.note: We consider the physical characteristics of each creature, recording and using real human voice, Foley, and creative processing to bring each creature to life with expressive emotion.

paragraphs.label: pets and complex cartoonish characters
paragraphs.note: We have the expertise to craft distinct character voices that make personalities shine. Designing sound for whimsical creatures requires balancing animal voices and human emotions.

paragraphs.label: facial capture
paragraphs.note: We help sound teams offload tedious and resource-consuming creature SFX work. Our scalable infrastructure ensures breeding massive amounts of them in your given timeline.

paragraphs.label: breeding army of creatures under a ticking clock
paragraphs.note: Sometimes, small pets and additional NPC are left to be produced at the end. We ensure each character's sounds have personality and are of top-notch quality.

We have extensive experience working for Hollywood movies and streaming shows, which helps us feel how each character or object should sound. We make custom props to achieve the sound we are looking for. We employ creative microphone techniques to capture truly distinctive sounds.
Large stages built specifically for Foley allow us to have several microphones and record acoustically natural-sounding Foley.

header.title: dialogue editorial
header.description: Frequently, dialogue is recorded at different times and places, with various equipment and quality. We can offload your handling of dialogue lines. We will ensure their clarity and coherency through necessary processing, restoration, or matching.

paragraphs.label: editorial
paragraphs.note: Starting from master and dialogue cleanup to batch deliveries.

paragraphs.label: fast turnaround
paragraphs.note: A large team and efficient management allow us to adjust to tight deadlines.

paragraphs.label: naming and delivery
paragraphs.note: We sit with you and create guidelines for each project to adapt to your requirements.

Our company started as a film audio post-production company, so we have a vast creative knowledge of how to craft interesting linear soundtracks that seamlessly translate into the realm of video games.

If you are on tight deadlines, we can finish your project; if you did most of the creative stuff and need to finalize it, we can do it.

What sets us apart is our unwavering commitment to delivering what production teams truly need: the right sound in the right place at the right time.

We can join in and take over the whole project's sound design or assist and take on some particular parts, like mixing, sound editing, Foley, or session management.
We prefer to join on early development rather than on the final cut to help craft sound as visual is being crafted.

paragraphs.label: audio programming
paragraphs.note: We collaborate closely with game studio programmers to design and assist in developing custom playback and audio processing systems that seamlessly integrate with their existing frameworks. Leveraging our extensive expertise in audio tool creation and experience across various game engines and audio middleware, we tune the code until it starts to resonate.

paragraphs.label: integration into middleware
paragraphs.note: We can work with you to create a custom workflow and pipeline that fits seamlessly into your existing production process. Whether you need us to deliver assets in a specific format, use software like WWISE, FMOD, or MetaSounds, or integrate with your team in a particular way, we are here to make it happen.
Our audio lab specializes in creating custom audio tools for each video game we work on. We build new acoustic and software instruments specifically tailored to each project to achieve this.
Not only does this give our games a distinct sonic identity, but it also gives us complete control and expression over the audio.

This attention to detail and dedication to creating unique audio experiences sets us apart. In addition to building custom instruments, we also record sound libraries to make unique worlds for our game projects.

top_section.text: we have an elite army of foley designers

paragraphs.note: We provide exceptional and cost-efficient Foley service, shaping each sound and leveling acoustical space, delivering the right sound at the right time and place for our clients.
With our expertise in Foley, conforming, and efficient workflow management, we aim to save our clients time and resources while ensuring their projects receive the attention to detail they deserve.
We are committed to understanding our client's needs and delivering high-quality programming, recording, editing, and pre-mixing services, all under a single, fixed pricing structure.
We continuously refine our workflows to adapt to our client's needs and strive to elevate the bar in foley design.

paragraphs.label: foley that has a right acoustical space
paragraphs.note: Our state-of-the-art stages are equipped with multi-microphone setups, providing the perfect environment for recording acoustic Foley.

In 2018, together with the film studio 'Georgian Film,' we restored the iconic facilities to their original glory. We upgraded them with longer Foley pits, state-of-the-art equipment, microphones, and preamps.

These spaces allow you to record top-notch quality Foley, create unique custom ingredients for sound design, and try daring experiments.

slides.title: foley stage a
slides.header: This is our primary Foley stage, a 120 sqm (1300 sq. ft) space designed explicitly for Foley work back in the '60s.
slides.description:
Once known as the 'Hall of Noises' in the Soviet Union, this stage served as the central hub for Foley's work within the Georgian film industry.

One of the hall's most impressive features is its outstanding acoustics. Despite its large size, we've designed the space to mimic the acoustics of everyday rooms. This versatility offers us a wealth of opportunities for experimentation and helps us produce an authentic-sounding Foley. Historically a screening hall, this space fell into disrepair after the Soviet Union's collapse. After our renovation, this hall has a new life as a 120 sqm (1300 sq. ft) Foley stage.

slides.title: foley stage b
slides.header: Historically a screening hall, this space fell into disrepair after the Soviet Union’s collapse.
slides.description: Introducing our newly built Stage, the ultimate sound recording studio for film and media projects. Equipped with high-quality microphones, versatile surfaces, and a wide range of props and equipment, it provides the perfect environment for creating realistic sound effects.

slides.title: foley stage c
slides.header: A small-sized Foley Stage is a versatile sound recording studio designed to create high-quality sound effects in limited spaces. Despite its smaller size, it is fully equipped with all the necessary sound equipment and props required for sound design.
slides.description: The benefit of a small-sized room is that it provides a more controlled acoustic environment for various sound design needs.

paragraphs.note: The right sound, in the right place without a lot of sweeteners — it's the principle that guides our work. We program, record, edit, and pre-mix Foley to elevate your story.
Imagine a kid running through 1850s America; it's not just his footfall but the coins jingling in his pocket that transport you there.

slides.title: 100 YEARS OF COLLECTING PROPS
slides.description:
We are proud to collaborate with two of the leading prop houses in the country, “GEORGIAN FILM” and “Art Things”, to bring you the largest collection of props available for use on our Foley stages.

With Georgian Film’s extensive collection, amassed since the 1920s, we have access to a wide range of props from various historical eras, as well as a diverse selection of guns and military equipment.

paragraphs.label: Every sound feels like it should be there at the right time
paragraphs.note:
Our scalable foley machine, supported by an army of talented people, ensures unparalleled efficiency. We deliver sounds in sync with the production track, perform foley conforms, and patch gaps seamlessly.

With our comprehensive Foley report, understanding deliveries is swift and straightforward. We do programming, recording, editing, and pre-mix, all for a single fee.

switch_values.name: cueing
switch_values.title: cueing title
switch_values.description: Pinpointing exact recording spots and organizing props in advance saves our artists' and mixers' valuable time and enhances their focus on creativity, allowing for a fluid transition into the recording phase.

switch_values.name: recording
switch_values.title: film recording
switch_values.description: With our multi-microphone placement techniques, we record acoustical Foley and impactful sounds that naturally enhance the narrative without requiring extensive sweeteners.

switch_values.name: editing
switch_values.title: Film editing
switch_values.description: We meticulously shape each sound to help tell the story. We go beyond conventional Foley by processing the sounds when needed and enhancing them with commercial, our rare collection, and custom-made libraries.

switch_values.name: pre mixing
switch_values.title: pre mixing
switch_values.description: Mixing is the process of balancing all of the different pieces that make up a film's soundtrack. The pre-mix stage is where each section of the tracklay (dialogue, foley, backgrounds, sound effects, music) will be individually mixed into the film.

team_members.name: Biko Gogaladze
team_members.bio: Biko Gogaladze never thought his dancing skills would lead him to become a Foley artist. In his career, Biko discovered that his sense of rhythm and the ability to imitate characters gave him superpowers as a Foley artist. Biko's Foley has been a highlight for many popular films and series.

team_members.name: Tornike Dzidzikashvili
team_members.bio: Tornike, a skilled Foley artist, intertwines his love for art and competitive gaming into his craft. With exceptional communication skills, he seamlessly translates ideas into captivating sound effects. His attention to detail makes Tornike a fantastic collaborator, infusing each project with creativity and ingenuity.

team_members.name: Beqa Turashvili
team_members.bio:
Beqa, a former football player with a genuine love for the art of sound, stumbled upon POSTRED in 2021 and was immediately intrigued. Despite facing initial rejection, he remained persistent and eventually became a highly skilled Foley artist with an unwavering focus on meticulous detail and the creative process.

Beqa's journey is a testament to the significance of pursuing one's passions and persevering through obstacles to succeed.

team_members.name: Giorgi Lekishvili
team_members.bio: Giorgi Lekishvili has an immense love of cinema; his original vision and sharp ear helps him make creative decisions during Foley mixing. He's been our invaluable team member since 2018.

team_members.name: Salome Maisuradze
team_members.bio: Salome's adoration for the cinema and video games inspired her to discover her true calling as a Foley mixer. Her unwavering ambition, meticulous attention to detail, and boundless creativity have made her a highly esteemed and invaluable team member.

team_members.name: Joni Amiranashvili
team_members.bio: Joni Amiranashvili fell in love with music at 15, like many others at POSTRED. From a young age, Joni was curious and detail-oriented, which led to his aspiration for music and a love of technology. This eventually became his beloved profession as a Foley Mixer.

team_members.name: Alexander Sanikidze
team_members.bio: Alexander Sanikidze's journey and discovery of the hidden world of Foley Sound Effects began with an absolute love of creation. His desire to be a part of the creative processes, have a chance to push his craft boundaries, and devise something that inspires others, has led him to POSTRED.

team_members.name: Rati Chkhetiani
team_members.bio: Rati is a passionate Foley editor with a keen eye for detail and a lightning-fast work ethic. With a deep love for movies, Rati brings magic into editing. His dedication to precision and appreciation for the art of Film make him an invaluable asset to any production.

team_members.name: Beso Kacharava
team_members.bio:
Beso Kacharava, the founder of POSTRED, has propelled the company to international acclaim in the film industry along with his team. Actively involved in projects requiring Foley, he embodies the creative drive. His strategic leadership has steered POSTRED for the past 9 years.

Beso's guiding principle is simple yet profound: do what you love to unlock your greatest potential.

team_members.name: Tina Babakishvili
team_members.bio:
Tina Babakishvili, co-owner and managing partner at POSTRED, plays a crucial role in strengthening client relationships and facilitating collaborations with sound professionals.

Living in LA and working closely with her team in Tbilisi, Georgia, she focuses on guiding POSTRED's strategic direction and actively participates in industry events.

team_members.name: Luka Lebanidze
team_members.bio:
Luka Lebanidze, leading POSTRED's Game Audio Division, blends his vast expertise in audio, business, and game development to forge strategic partnerships and innovate in video game audio services.

His deep understanding of game studios’ needs fuels POSTRED's robust, scalable infrastructure, ensuring the delivery of high-quality audio assets and seamless integration with game studios. His recognition as a Forbes “30 Under 30” in Tech has highlighted Luka's innovative edge.

team_members.name: Ani Tsintsadze
team_members.bio:
Ani Tsintsadze leads POSTRED Academy, starting her journey after studying at Berklee College of Music. She quickly stood out in the sound department at POSTRED and learned the business as the CEO's executive assistant.

Now, she uses her music passion and leadership to inspire new talent, showing that hard work and love for music can lead to great success.

projects.title: Painkiller
projects.description: The causes and consequences of America's opioid epidemic unfold in this drama following its perpetrators, victims and an investigator seeking the truth.

projects.title: Ferrari
projects.description: Set in the summer of 1957, with Enzo Ferrari's auto empire in crisis, the ex-racer turned entrepreneur pushes himself and his drivers to the edge as they launch into the Mille Miglia, a treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy.

projects.title: The Idol
projects.description: Jocelyn is desperate to reclaim her rightful title as the greatest and sexiest pop diva in America after a nervous breakdown disrupted her most recent tour after Tedros, a notorious nightclub entrepreneur, reignites her passions.

projects.title: Thanksgiving
projects.description: After a Black Friday riot ends in tragedy, a mysterious Thanksgiving-inspired killer terrorizes Plymouth, Massachusetts - the birthplace of the infamous holiday.

projects.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
projects.description: Two strangers land jobs with a spy agency that offers them a life of espionage, wealth, and travel. The catch: new identities in an arranged marriage.

projects.title: Totally Killer
projects.description: When the infamous 'Sweet Sixteen Killer' returns 35 years after his first murder spree to claim another victim, 17-year-old Jamie accidentally travels back in time to 1987, determined to stop the killer before he can start.

projects.title: The Pigeon Tunnel
projects.description: Spans six decades as le Carré gives his final and most personal interview, interrupted with rare archival footage and dramatic anecdotes. It is set against the stormy Cold War backdrop that extends into the present day.

projects.title: The Kill Room
projects.description: A hitman, his boss, an art dealer and a money-laundering scheme that accidentally turns the assassin into an overnight avant-garde sensation, one that forces her to play the art world against the underworld.

projects.title: The Passenger
projects.description: A man is forced to face his fears and confront his troubled past. He must find a way to survive when his co-worker snaps and goes on a violent killing spree.

projects.title: Dreamin' Wild
projects.description: Musical duo Donnie and Joe Emerson spend everything they have to produce a record in the 1970s.

projects.title: Jules
projects.description: Milton lives a quiet life of routine in a small western Pennsylvania town, but finds his day upended when a UFO and its extra-terrestrial passenger crash land in his backyard.

projects.title: Drive-Away Dolls
projects.description: Jamie regrets her breakup with her girlfriend, while Marian needs to relax. In search of a fresh start, they embark on an unexpected road trip to Tallahassee, but things quickly go awry when they cross paths with a group of inept criminals.

projects.title: The Sweet East
projects.description: A picaresque journey through the cities and woods of the Eastern seaboard of the U.S undertaken by Lillian, a high school senior from South Carolina. She gets her first glimpse of the wider world on a class trip to Washington, D.C.

projects.title: A Beautiful Life
projects.description: Elliott, a young fisherman with an extraordinary voice, gets the chance of a lifetime when high-profile music manager Suzanne discovers him at a party.

projects.title: No Hard Feelings
projects.description: On the brink of losing her home, Maddie finds an intriguing job listing: helicopter parents looking for someone to bring their introverted 19-year-old son out of his shell before college. She has one summer to make him a man or die trying.

projects.title: Blackbird Blackbird Blackberry
projects.description: Etero, a 48-year-old woman living in a small village in Georgia, never wanted a husband. She cherishes her freedom as much as her cakes. But her choice to live alone is the cause of much gossip among her fellow villagers. Unexpectedly, she finds herself passionately falling for a man, and is suddenly faced with the decision to pursue a relationship or continue a life of independence.

projects.title: Reality
projects.description: A former American intelligence specialist was given the longest sentence for the unauthorized release of government information to the media about Russian interference in the 2016 United States elections via an email operation.
An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

projects.title: Violent Night
projects.description: When a group of mercenaries attack the estate of a wealthy family, Santa Claus must step in to save the day (and Christmas).

projects.title: My Father's Dragon
projects.description: Elmer Elevator searches for a captive Dragon on Wild Island and finds much more than he could ever have anticipated.

projects.title: Raymond & Ray
projects.description: Half brothers Raymond and Ray reunite when their estranged father dies - and discover that his final wish was for them to dig his grave. Together, they process who they've become as men, both because of their father and in spite of him.

projects.title: Harlem
projects.description: A group of four friends follow their dreams after graduating from college together.

projects.title: The Best Man: The Final Chapters
projects.description: As relationships evolve and past grievances resurface in the unpredictable stages of midlife crisis meets midlife renaissance.

projects.title: Unhuman
projects.description: A group of high school students whose school bus crashes on a field trip. Relationships are tested once they realize they are being stalked by an attacker who intends to drive them out and straight into a horrifying fight to survive.

projects.title: Scream
projects.description: 25 years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, Calif., a new killer dons the Ghostface mask and begins targeting a group of teenagers to resurrect secrets from the town's deadly past.

projects.title: C'mon C'mon
projects.description: When his sister asks him to look after her son, a radio journalist embarks on a cross-country trip with his energetic nephew to show him life away from Los Angeles.

projects.title: Umma
projects.description: Amanda and her daughter live a quiet life on an American farm, but when the remains of her estranged mother arrive from Korea, Amanda becomes haunted by the fear of turning into her own mother.

projects.title: Windfall
projects.description: A man breaks into a tech billionaire's empty vacation home, but things go sideways when the arrogant mogul and his wife arrive for a last-minute getaway.

projects.title: Presencias
projects.description: Follows a man whose pregnant wife gets murdered and despite the police investigation, the truth is unknown. He tries to find what happened, which confronts him with situations of suspense and terror.

projects.title: Thresh Unbound: A Night at the Inn
The Weekend Away
projects.description: A weekend getaway to Croatia that goes awry when a woman is accused of killing her best friend. As she attempts to clear her name and uncover the truth, her efforts unearth a painful secret.

projects.title: Torn Hearts
projects.description: Follows a country music duo who seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

projects.title: Sirens
projects.description: Lilas and Shery, co-founders and guitarists of the Middle East's first all-female metal band, wrestle with friendship, sexuality and destruction in their pursuit of becoming thrash metal rock stars.

projects.title: Almost Home Lunar Revel 2022 Cinematic Trailer
The Novice
projects.description: A college freshman joins her university's rowing team and undertakes an obsessive physical and psychological journey to make it to the top varsity boat, no matter the cost.

projects.title: This is Going to Hurt
projects.description: Set on Labour Ward with all its hilarity and heart-lifting highs but also its gut-wrenching lows, the show delivers a brutally honest depiction of life as a junior doctor on the wards, and the toll the job can take back home.

projects.title: Ghosts
projects.description: A group of spirits restlessly squabble in an abandoned country house. To their despair, a young couple inherits the house with hopeful plans to renovate it into a luxury hotel.

projects.title: Together
projects.description: A husband and wife are forced to re-evaluate themselves and their relationship through the reality of the COVID-19 lockdown.

projects.title: Anne Boleyn
projects.description: The final months of Boleyn's life, her struggle with Tudor England's patriarchal society, her desire to secure a future for her daughter, Elizabeth, and the brutal reality of her failure to provide Henry with a male heir.

projects.title: All Creatures Great & Small
projects.description: The numerous adventures of a countryside veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire, England.

projects.title: Wolfe
projects.description: The adventures of Professor Wolfe Kinteh, a crime scene investigator in the north of England.

projects.title: Franzy's Soup-Kitchen
projects.description: It follows alien Chef Franzy as she discovers that her special pink soup is not just delicious, but also magical, when she shares it with starving creatures living on a strange planet.

projects.title: Swamp Lion
projects.description: A father in a south-Texas border town starts trafficking drugs to pay for his son's cancer treatment.

projects.title: Brighton 4th
projects.description: Georgian wrestler Kakhi travels to Brooklyn to help his son out of a gambling debt.

projects.title: And then We Danced
projects.description: A passionate coming-of-age tale set amidst the conservative confines of modern Tbilisi, the film follows Merab, a competitive dancer who is thrown off balance by the arrival of Irakli, a fellow male dancer with a rebellious streak.

projects.title: Shindisi
projects.description: A story of the film is based on real events that occurred during the Russian military intervention in Georgia in 2008. Shindisi is a name of the place where Russian occupation forces sieged Georgian military after peace corridor was promised, this is when ordinary villagers took risks to save wounded Georgian soldiers.

testimonials.name: Justin M. Davey
testimonials.text: POSTRED did phenomenal work with Foley (on 'My Father's Dragon'), and they were willing to experiment and work with us. They were on board throughout the entire process, feeding us new material as the animation was being completed. We were able to do a lot of experimenting, back and forth.

testimonials.name: Vidar Grande
testimonials.text: My experience with POSTRED has been consistently positive. They have a perfect track record of delivering on time, and their Foley work is excellent. They truly understand the essence of each scene and provide exactly what is needed without any unnecessary frills that could complicate my job. Working with POSTRED has always been a smooth and enjoyable experience. Their commitment to delivering high-quality results consistently surpasses my expectations.

testimonials.name: Ryan Billia
testimonials.text: Working with the extremely talented team at POSTRED has been such a wonderful experience. They approach every project with a passion for the work and an understanding of the deep level of detail needed. They always deliver on time and are a joy to communicate with. They are amazing Foley artists through and through!

testimonials.name: Robert Hein
testimonials.text: Collaboration with POSTRED has been extremely rewarding. POSTRED has met every opportunity with the highest levels of expertise. A great group of talented and innovative Foley artists.

testimonials.name: Zach Seivers
testimonials.text: More I mix POSTRED's work, the happier I get. You guys did a really stellar job.

vacancies.title: foley designer
vacancies.about: POSTRED Academy is a dynamic institution in the creative industries, offering courses and workshops in post-production, music, and creative leadership. We are dedicated to fostering creativity and innovation within the local community in Georgia, Tbilisi.
vacancies.description: We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Academic Coordinator/Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing the day-to-day operations of the academy, facilitating communication between students and lecturers, and assisting in grant writing.

responsibilities.description: Coordinate and oversee academic programs and schedules.
Communicate effectively with students, instructors, and other stakeholders.
Manage the registration process and maintain student records.
Collaborate with instructors to ensure course materials and resources are available.
Assist in the development of grant proposals and funding applications.
Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of academic programs.
Address and resolve issues related to academic processes and student concerns.
Provide support for events and initiatives organized by the academy

requirements.description: Proven experience in academic coordination or management.
Proficiency in grant writing and proposal development.

skills.description: Familiarity with the creative industries is a plus.
